alert.note: Alert for Lake; Obion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:11PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pemiscot, western Obion and Lake Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 411 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cottonwood Grove, or 9 miles northeast of Caruthersville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reelfoot Lake State Park, Tiptonville, Ridgely, Troy, Cottonwood Grove, Hornbeak, Samburg, Wynnburg, Wright, Cronanville, Roneys Store, Sunkist Beach, Blue Bank, Proctor City, Jacksonville, Madie, Spout Springs, Mooring, Walnut Log and Grays Camp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Missouri...and west Tennessee.
